entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • How to tell if a Type is "awaitable" in native AOT / trimmed apps #103258
  • TE Fortunes regression on Windows #103256
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'cond == test' during 'Optimize post-layout' #103252
  • is there a way to not show native AOT warnings for statically inaccessible code during build? #103250
  • Unable to build project referencing latest .NET 9 Preview 6 Microsoft.NET.ILLink package #103249
  • Assertion in BigIntegerCalculator #103247
  • [browser][ST] Wasm tests timeout #103246
  • [API Proposal]: new ActivitySource.CreateActivity overload #103245
  • Support LDAPS ( TLS ) in System.DirectoryServices.Protocols ON Linux #103243
  • Minor race condition in HttpHeaders parsing #103238
    Future
  • Attaching an interop debugger to an x64 .Net on ARM64 fails to intiailize debugging #103235
    Future
  • [NativeAOT/linux-arm32] long and double thread statics are not 8-byte aligned #103234
  • Type.GetType(string) can't find type if assembly loaded using AssemblyLoadContext #103222
  • Unable to retrieve MethodInfo for delegates to certain default interface methods #103219
    Future
  • StackTrace APIs don't work for unreasonably large/negative skipFrames values #103218
    Future

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Allow Hook for Custom Resource Deserialization (BinaryFormatter) #101301
    9.0.0
  • Remove BinaryFormatter usage from System.Resources.Extensions #39292
    9.0.0
  • App throws TypeLoadException when published trimmed but works fine when published native AOT (no trim warnings) #102796
    9.0.0
  • coreCLR fails to build on Windows arm64 machine #103175
  • Regarding Memory Leak Check in Android Platform with dotnet-gcdump #101847
  • Suppress Interop/SuppressGCTransition/SuppressGCTransitionNegativeTest/SuppressGCTransitionNegativeTest.cmd for JITStress #93533
  • TryAddWithoutValidation for multiple values could be more efficient #64049
    Future
  • HttpHeaders TryParse can throw #102584
    9.0.0
  • SG unit tests are incredibly slow when run in Debug because they run on top of a Debug CoreCLR #103227

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix Http 1.1's read-ahead task management #103257
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • Move the working BinaryFormatter implementation to a NuGet package #103255
    area-System.Runtime, binary-serialization, 9.0.0
  • [manual] Merge release/6.0-staging into release/6.0 #103254
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow, 6.0.x
  • [manual] Merge release/8.0-staging into release/8.0 #103253
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow, 8.0.x
  • Fix Microsoft.NET.ILLink package #103251
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Block System.Numerics.Tensors tests on native AOT #103248
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • Changed TensorSpan and ReadOnlyTensorSpan layout for better performance. #103244
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Cleanup some handling around Avx10v1 #103241
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Dispose XmlReader in CreateRuntimeRootDescriptorFile #103239
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Dispose XMLReader after using in Xml/Utils.cs #103236
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [android] Fix build withe newer NDK #103233
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • Make System.Formats.Nrbf public #103232
    area-System.Security, binary-serialization
  • [android] Don't include `JNI_OnLoad` in `libSystem.Security.Cryptography.Native.Android.a` #103231
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [CI][aot] Do not overwrite `scenarios` argument if they were passed #103229
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Add support for Sve.DuplicateSelectedScalarToVector() #103228
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • [HybridGlobalization] Convert narrow no-break spaces to spaces #103226
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios, os-browser
  • [browser] Increase timeout for System.Memory.Tests and System.Private.Xml.Tests #103221
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Add new DiagnosticMethodInfo public API #103220
    area-System.Diagnostics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add SearchValues<char> implementation for two sets of 128 chars #103216
    area-System.Buffers, 9.0.0

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #102346
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #102397
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0-staging] Set version in ZIP local header to ZIP64 when file offset is >4GB #103006
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO.Compression
  • Run System.Diagnostics.StackTrace tests with NAOT #103151
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • ILLink: Sweep .override for interface method if the .interfaceImpl is removed #102857
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [release/8.0] [mono][interp] Fix type of args when inlining method #102801
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 8.0.x
  • TryAddWithoutValidation for multiple values could be more efficient #102845
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Remove cached cgroup values (#102971) #103166
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr, 8.0.7
  • Fix build breaks in CoreCLR interpreter #103240
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix sending ICMP echo request when host is unreachable #103158
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • [workload] Use the same naming as net9 workload #103049
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure, area-Workloads
  • Delete dead code in winwrap.h #103193
    area-VM-coreclr
  • refactor: rename COMPlus classes to make a clear distinction with COM interop #102922
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix a few small leaks by properly freeing the result of g_strsplit #103189
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • [Release/8.0] Fix handling exceptions on shutdown #101915
    Servicing-approved, area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 8.0.7
  • Fix WhiteSpace validation in HttpHeaders #102693
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • [browser] Chrome bump reviewers update #103230
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Convert ReRegisterForFinalize to QCALL #103211
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Bump Windows SDK version in .vsconfig #103217
    needs-area-label
  • Use PayloadReader in System.Resources.Extensions #102379
    area-System.Resources, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, binary-serialization, 9.0.0
  • Optimize relocation counting in DehydratedDataNode.GetData #103202
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • Remove global spinlock for EH stacktrace #103076
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2470465 #102770
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Use LTO for linux as well #103058
    needs-area-label
  • [Testing] CET pipeline #103179
  • Don't trim ShouldSerializeXXX and ResetXXX members that may be called with reflection #102780
    area-System.Data, 9.0.0
  • Handle more than 64 registers - Part 5 #103188
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Intrinsics for blazor #102670
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Move src/native libraries that are shared between runtime builds to be targets-driven #103184
    EventPipe, area-Infrastructure
  • [mono] Remove some domain stuff from the debugger #103186
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix `LoggerProviderDebugView.CalculateEnabledLogLevel` when the level is `None` #103209
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • [wasm] emscripten bump 3.1.56 #100334
    area-Build-mono
  • ARM64-SVE: gathervector #103159
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Introduce IBufferedLogRecord #103138
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Add basic support for folding and normalizing hwintrinsic trees in morph #103143
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move the thread alloc context off of Thread in CoreCLR and NativeAOT #103055
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-VM-coreclr
  • Instrumentation #100294
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-GC-mono
  • [release/8.0][Apple] Use NSLocale.preferredLanguages on for default locale name #102748
    area-System.Globalization, os-mac-os-x
  • Add more ZipArchive tests to confirm the Zip64 fix does not affect reading zip files generatd with the old bug #103152
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • field sequences for boxes #103185
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Convert remaining array FCalls to managed #102739
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Avoid long busy-waiting between hijack retries. #103212
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add BFloat16 #98643
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Cleanup some FEATURE_... ifdefs in the GC #103200
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Support IAlternateEqualityComparer with FrozenDictionary/Set #103191
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 125.0.6422.141, windows: 126.0.6478.36 #103204
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [RISC-V][x64] WiP: Passing empty struct fields #101796
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add AbsoluteCompare* APIs #102611
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • [NativeAOT] Enable `-dead_strip` linker optimization by default on Apple platforms #103039
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Enable NativeAOT runtime tests on MacCatalyst #102882
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-maccatalyst, 9.0.0
  • Micro-optimize type check in GVMDependenciesNode.SearchDynamicDependencies #103199
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Adding support for open generic types in attributes #103213
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
